website_summaries.verdict: A wide range of features make this an outstanding quality cover, although you will pay more for it.
pros: Comes in a variety of sizes for ATVs and motorcycles
Zipper panel lets you access gas tank, key, and other areas
Comes with night reflective strips, and brass grommets to lock it up
cons: The color fades quickly after a few months of direct sun exposure

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely well made size medium cover that fits my 2018 Polaris 450 HO sportsman like a glove. I added a OEM front rack and a dual gun rack to the front storage compartment and it still fits very well. Having owned several ATV's and always covering them, I can say this is far and away the best cover I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: grit

customer_reviews.title: Really good product. Medium ATV cover
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, well made product for an ATV, 700cc. Couple of extra features, for example a zipper at your steering , so you do not need to take off the entire cover if you forget something in your ATV under the cover. Extra straps at the side and the top to tide down even more snug tite. But you do not need to use the straps still working very well. Really good product. Medium ATV cover, fit on a 700cc ATV snag tite the wind can not grab it, rubber band around the bottom build in..
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Quality cover!
customer_reviews.text: I got the Large for my Honda Rubicon 500 with a speaker box on front and a cargo box on the back rack. I am impressed by the quality especially since I just installed a dud on my side by side. I like that it goes all the way to the ground. It came with straps but I’m not using them as the wind hardly ever blows in Georgia. I am taking off a star for the bad language on the front of the cover, I dont like it. If it doesn’t bother you, then consider this a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Good product, worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in Medium - fits my Grizzly 700 perfectly - actually a little large, but I didn't want it tight like the nylon version I was using. This one is worth the extra dollars compared to others on Amazon - good workmanship and materials. I previously used a nylon competitor which dried out and would easily rip when it snagged on my ATV. I used spring clips to keep the wind from getting under the cover and allow snow and rain to run off - I keep my ATV outside so it ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: R Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these to cover our ATVs. They sit outside in the 100 degree heat and have held up really well. The black color has faded some. The covers are easy to put over the ATV and tighten down so they don't blow away. It is nice to have the zipper access to the front steering area.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: I have a Polaris 570 and this cover is perfect. It wraps the entire ATV including wheels which ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a Polaris 570 and this cover is perfect. It wraps the entire ATV including wheels which is really nice for protection. There are zippered openings which are really nice to get to instrument panel without having to remove entire cover. The cover is excellent quality and completely waterproof. Moved ATV out of garage and under deck and wanted similar protection as keeping it inside. I would highly recommend these covers!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas M MacLeod

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer service
customer_reviews.text: Med long fits my 2019 polaris sportsman 570 like a glove. Contacted seller because of a missing strap. I had a response e-mail within 11 min. I was impressed to say the least. Had a new strap sent and already delivered. Unbelievable customer service. I will definitely recommend them to others and will make more purchases myself from them. Still can not believe 11 MIN response time. Cover seems to be well made of good material. Survived outside during the recent "bomb cyclone" that came by last week with only 2 straps so I am confident it will last. As the name says BADASS cover
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: A great value. Watch the sizing.
customer_reviews.text: This is similar in quality to the manufacturer's $120.00 cover. If I get four years out of it I will be satisfied. Be careful with the sizing. My 2019 Kodiak uses a medium size cover from Badass but a large from any other brand. It fits almost all the way to the ground. The elastic at the bottom could be a little tighter but it should hold up for anything but tornado winds. That being said the overall quality is exceptional and should prove to be a good value in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Cover
customer_reviews.text: The cover is great and I highly recommend it IF YOU ARE NOT TRAILERING. As stated this is a great cover if you plan on using it to cover something in place sitting still. This cover is likely not heavy duty enough to trailer down the interstate I purchased the XL cover and it fits well on my 2015 Polaris Sportsman Touring SP with front and rear brush guards installed. It is easy on and off and covers the ATV from top to just about the ground. If not trailering and you are looking for a good cover to protect your investment I would suggest this cover for you.
customer_reviews.author: Big Timmy

customer_reviews.title: Great fit on my 2017 Kodiak
customer_reviews.text: So far the cover is awesome! Fits my Kodiak perfect, seems well built with sealed seams. Had a light mist and the quad was dry when I took it off. We will have to see how long it lasts! Update: Had this on my Kodiak all summer last year. It had faded a bit in the harsh Cali sunshine. We received more than 50" of rain this year up in the Santa Cruz mtns. Took the covery off and the only moisture was on the rear fenders where the rear rack held water and was touching. Very pleased with this cover!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Hammons

customer_reviews.title: Different cut panels are fading differently
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 covers that were purchased about the same time last year. They are both fading but in a peculiar way - different panels of material are fading evenly at different rates than panels next to them. These covers are not exposed directly to the sun, just some of the material seems to be less color fast. It doesn't seem to make a difference where the panel is, it's just that some almost appear to be made of a different material. Spending this amount on covers - especially ones that aren't even waterproof - I expected more.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Hull

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: I do not know how to respond to the is it warm question. The Polaris does not care, it is now warm so I guess it is warm now. This critter fits very well on my 2019 Polaris Sportsman 570. I have the plow dismounted so I cannot address that. The cover seems to be well made and kept the 4 wheeler dry. It can be used while trailering the ute. All in all seems like a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Dan H

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not for towing
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover, feels well made. But after towing with it on the atv, it became a hassle. I did follow the directions to the letter, but the access zipper kept coming undone, had the zip tie it close, but then wind just pulled the zipper seen open, so had to throw duct tape on it. Then the straps kept getting loose, had to tie knots, So after all the trouble, I did have a few seems come undone, luckily I carry a sewing kit in the truck. Now I do side tow the atv, so maybe that’s was the issue, otherwise it’s not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Takamine

customer_reviews.title: It’s doing the job...
customer_reviews.text: We might have gotten the larger cover, but this one will do. They say heavy duty, but could be heavier. Easy to attach to our 4-wheeler and keeps it dry. Nothing on the market, for this price, that is of better quality material so this will do the job... I will add that the last one we bought only lasted 3 years, keep in mind it was continuously exposed to the Texas weather.
customer_reviews.author: Paditle

customer_reviews.title: ATV covers that fit like a glove, are well made and a great value.
customer_reviews.text: These covers are very sturdy and well made. I put them on our Yamaha 350 Raptors and they fit well. I have not yet traveled with them yet but with three straps to hold them on and an elastic wrap down around the bottom to “hug” the tires, I am confident they will travel nicely. I also like the zipper access to the gas tank. I am very pleased and would recommend them to others.
customer_reviews.author: LLamor

customer_reviews.title: Not highway worthy
customer_reviews.text: Cover did not hold up under highway speeds, even when strapping it down as instructed. Zipper failed, and opened up a large hole. The company provided excellent customer service when I let them know about the issue. I would not recommend this cover if this is your intended use.
customer_reviews.author: tksbaskets

customer_reviews.title: I’m very happy with the fit as there is extra room width ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an initial use review....I just received this and it’s the ONLY cover I could find that fit over...completely....my cub cadet (42” deck) riding lawnmower. The other covers wouldn’t cover th deck completley and NO others would cover the rear bagger system that I had installed. I’m very happy with the fit as there is extra room width wise, if you had a wider deck ( up to 50” perhaps), has straps that click into themselves to firm things up. I will update this review later after it’s gone through rainstorms, wind, and snow perhaps
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Fuller

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I have bought several of similar products from other sources. This one is by far the best I have owned. Heavy duty construction and secure fit is noteworthy. If it holds up in the long term, as I believe it will, it won't be the last one of these that I buy.
customer_reviews.author: G. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Made the trip to camp about 5 hours away. Did not survive the trip home. Came apart at the top access zipper. Kind of a useless zipper anyway. About 10 minutes down the road I had to stop and put some extra straps around it because the ones that came with it are just not enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I like the rubberized lining in the cover and the fact that it actually fits my machine. It is light enough that one person can cover the machine by themselves but heavy enough that it won't flop around in the wind while you are covering it. I'm quite impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made and thought-through cover. Size is correct per listing. Has reflective stripes for safety, bungee edges to secure at wheels/sides, and three tie straps to hold in place in high wind.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Schriefer

customer_reviews.title: Quality of the product
customer_reviews.text: Just got an ATV and it needs to be stored outdoors this is the perfect cover protects it from the elements would highly recommend. High quality material lots of tiedowns and straps to hold in place in heavy wind!When I get my Next ATV I’ll definitely get this cover
customer_reviews.author: Jimfixit

customer_reviews.title: Covers entire ATV
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover, not so stiff that it won't kind of mold to ATV, but substantial enough to feel sturdy. Covered entire ATV but I have a smaller one. It should cover any of them. Seems to be well made and can fasten tightly if needed. Been rained on already and was completely dry.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Fits Polaris 850/450
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Medium size. Fits my 2010 Polaris 850 xp and 2017 450 Utility very well. I will recommend these to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Pure quality zipper !  Not good
customer_reviews.text: I recently opened box about two weeks ago and today I noticed the sipper access oppenning over tank area has come apart , looks like it is not a heavy duty zipper . And is a tiny nylon zipper ,im a very disappointing customer, i payed more thinking it would be trouble free .... now what ???
customer_reviews.author: william f.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, rugged quality product
customer_reviews.text: Very well made ATV cover, and fit my Polaris 500 Sportsman perfectly, as promised. I really like how secure this cover is, even without the extra straps. I can get it in place very quickly for those surprise rain storms. As rugged as this cover is, I expect it will last for many years, even at our 7300’ altitude.
customer_reviews.author: mtlady

customer_reviews.title: Storage bag too small
customer_reviews.text: This cover seems to fit my Polaris 450HO perfectly. The only issue is the storage bag, (if the bag it came in is a storage bag). There is no way to fold this cover in a manner to get it back into the storage bag when it's not in use. A larger storage bag would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Trailerable, not so much. Fantastic Customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I gave 5 stars for the customer service. Excellent! The trailerable part not so much! 62 miles into an 2200 mile trip the one cover came apart pretty much. The other cover stayed good for about 1200 miles. These were at hi way speeds. Covers fit great! Just couldn’t handle the turbulence of the road. They should be great covers to leave on ATV while parked. Their customer service is remarkable and pretty quick to remedy the situation! I will definitely like to do business with them in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Towable
customer_reviews.text: These things are really bad ass! Best cover I have ever bought BY FAR! I live in Montana and have these on all the time and tow them on my open trailer, use them in -30 when going ice fishing. I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: David J Sedlock

customer_reviews.title: durable and nicely made
customer_reviews.text: great value for the money bought for honda rubicon 500 fits great, very durable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Will built.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very durable. Had two big wind storms and cover held up great. No rips. Fits over my Honda Rubicon with 2 mirrors and 2nd seat. Plenty of room and covers all the way down to the bottom of the tires.
customer_reviews.author: stormchaser

customer_reviews.title: Great quality cover.
customer_reviews.text: I found this cover to be well made, and a good fit for a couple different atv's. So I would recommend this product to others. I will be getting another one soon myself.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Good ATV cover
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased at least 5 ATV covers over the last few years and each one of them have only lasted less that 4 months each. This one from Bad Ass Moto has lasted 6 months and still look great!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Harris

customer_reviews.title: High quality and sturdy material
customer_reviews.text: The material feels very sturdy and the inclusion of the tightening straps helps to ensure that the cover stays put during windy conditions. I'm replacing a different cover that I got less than a year ago because it was shredded by the winds out here. I'm hopeful and confident that this one will do much better as there is considerably less loose material flapping freely with the extra tie downs.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a bit big for my quad but the others I bought were too small They collect water and freeze in the hang over No tearing seems to hold up to the wind realy well
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for the ATV!
customer_reviews.text: What a great ATV cover! I bought the medium sized cover for my 2002 Polaris sportsman. It fits like a glove. The material is very durable. I really like the straps. The tank access zipper is a very nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ATV-Medium fits my BigBear 400 perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: ATV-Medium fits my Yamaha BigBear 400 perfectly. Very well made, heavy duty. Nice bag and straps included but I doubt I'd ever get it folded up tight enough to go back in the bag. With the elastic and straps I feel it would stay on in extreme weather if that's what you needed.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Free

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is amazing! It keeps my Atv about 90% dry and water just beads right off of it. I have it on an arctic cat 500 and the medium fits very well.
customer_reviews.author: cntrygrl023

customer_reviews.title: Quality material
customer_reviews.text: The material quality seems to be excellent.. fit my Honda recon like a glove ..nice add one. Haven't tried the tie downs not look like they would hold in extreme weather
customer_reviews.author: blane brown

customer_reviews.title: Will fit most quads
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a little expensive but it is very nice quality
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Fit and tie downs
customer_reviews.text: Only gave it a 4 because I have not towed with it on. Otherwise seems to be a quality product. The fit is good and the tie downs look like they will hold up to the rigors of towing. The cover seems to be quite durable. Would recommend to anyone. When my boat cover wears out I will purchase a cover from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L.

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover, the small does not fit my 2019 Raptor 700 that well, it will not cover the front tires, should have got the next size up. Nice cover though.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Fits well roomy and snug fit tank acces door is nice..eyelets to secure when towing in an open trailer is a nice option...fits my polaris xplorer 400 with no problem...good value for the price
customer_reviews.author: Mary Slavik

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, heavy duty cover. For me, the biggest down fall is the lack of instructions on how to secure the cover to the 4 wheeler. We’ll see how well it holds up to nasty Wyoming winds. Will update in a few weeks
customer_reviews.author: frogtat2

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product exceeds expectations. The cover fit great and in a way that the wind hasn't been an issue. The fit and holding up in a very windy environment were major concerns and this cover has proven to be worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Quality at a great price!!! The small size works great for my riding lawnmower. You will like this cover. and the strap system is easy and very efective even in windy conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Cieslewitz

customer_reviews.title: This cover is Great! Very well made
customer_reviews.text: This cover is Great! Very well made. The wheeler lives outside all year in the cold snowy north east. The cover has been snowed on, rained on, frozen in -32 degree weather and no problems. Water will pool up on the cover but it has't leaked a drop. One small problem was the straps included to for travel were too short to reach from left to right and front to back. But Badass Moto Gear was right there to provide the best customer service. Quick and professional. I WILL be a customer again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Chico VT

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cover for the price, fits well and appears well made with well thought out design.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Ed

customer_reviews.title: Fits great. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good material that I think will hold up. We bought them for our canam 2 ups and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Smith

customer_reviews.title: great protection but does change color
customer_reviews.text: The value is great for protection from the elements but it green does change to more of a brown color after a few months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cover
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the cover, it seems to be made of durable material (time will tell). It fits well and has several ways to secure it for either transport or high winds.
customer_reviews.author: Hxer

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Feels heavyweight & high quality compared to cheaper covers. Comes with 3 tightening straps, so it will definitely not blow off in the wind or while hauling it.

customer_reviews.title: Covered ATV
customer_reviews.text: Seems very sturdy. Do far so hood but only been a few (3) months

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brute force 750cc atv. This cover is thick and fits my atv like a glove. It keeps the snow and rain off it very well. The fabric is hyrorobic and rain runs off it like nothing. The cover fits all the way down and around the tires. I highly recommend this product if you store your atv outside.
customer_reviews.author: Marshmallow

customer_reviews.title: Quality construction, lots of tie downs and large enough to cover the tires
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase, we looked at a lot of covers before deciding on this one and we made the right choice. Made well and totally covers our CF Moto 600.
customer_reviews.author: deadeye

customer_reviews.title: Good cover, bad language
customer_reviews.text: Good quality cover that serves its purpose nicely. Only reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is that it says “Badass Moto Gear” in big red letters across it. I bought 2 of them not realizing it and one was for my 6 year old. Not to be overly sensitive to bad language but I would not have purchased had I looked more closely first.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for protection from Florida sun and rain!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Bought a large for my 2017 Honda 4 trax rancher and I'm glad I didn't go smaller!

customer_reviews.text: Material seems good but one of the buckles was broken out of the package.

customer_reviews.text: I never review things but this cover is extremely well built and waterproof. It also fits snug and appears to be very durable so far. Definitely doing business with this company again.

customer_reviews.title: It came as expected.  Repellency appears to be excellent.  Only time will attest to its durability.
